title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
**TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree - A Cozy Retreat and Playground for Your Feline Friend**

Transform your home into a feline paradise with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree! Designed with both comfort and play in mind, this 2-in-1 haven offers your cat the perfect spot to relax and satisfy their scratching needs.

**Key Features:**
- **Elegant 2-in-1 Design:** This cat tree doubles as a cozy condo and a durable sisal scratching post that naturally attracts your cat's claws away from your furniture.
- **Premium Materials:** The surface is covered with 600g skin-friendly plush, while the base is layered with a soft carpet, ensuring a luxurious and comfortable experience for your cat.
- **Stable and Secure:** A well-designed base prevents tipping and wobbling, ensuring your cat's safety. For added stability, it's recommended to place the cat tree on a flat floor against the wall.
- **Aesthetic Home Integration:** The unique leaves design not only entertains your cat but also serves as a touch of greenery, seamlessly blending with your home decor.
- **Functionality for Felines:** With a spacious condo that's just the right size for kittens or one medium cat, and an enticing hanging ball, your cat will have the ultimate rest and play area.
- **Hassle-Free Assembly:** Set up is a breeze, taking only 1 to 8 minutes with the included set of tools and easy-to-follow instructions.
- **Dedicated Customer Service:** Our commitment to quality products is matched by our dedication to providing attentive service. Customer satisfaction is our top pursuit, and our contact information is readily available for any assistance you may need.
- **Compact Dimensions:** Measuring 11 inches in length, 15 inches in width, and 41 inches in height, this cat tree is a perfect fit for any room.
- **Color Variety:** Choose from three elegant colors to match your home decor - Grey, Beige, or Green.
- **Lightweight and Portable:** Weighing at just 6 pounds, this cat tree can be easily moved around your home.

**Package Contents:**
- 1× TSCOMON 41" Cat Tree
- 1× Assembly Instruction
- 1× Set of Tools

**Important Notes:**
- Please check the size of the cat tree before purchasing to ensure it meets your needs.
- For the safety of children, do not allow them to play with the cat tree.

Add a touch of comfort and excitement to your cat's life with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree. It's not just a cat tree, it's a piece of home for your beloved pet. Order yours today and watch your cat enjoy their new favorite spot!

**TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree**

Give your feline friend their own personal playground with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree! This 2-in-1 cat condo and scratching post is designed with your cat's comfort and your home’s aesthetics in mind.

**Key Features:**
- **Design:** A 2-in-1 Cat Condo and Cat Sisal Scratching Post that is both practical and stylish, featuring a leaves design that seamlessly integrates into your home decor as a touch of greenery.
- **Material:** Covered with 600g skin-friendly plush and a base of soft carpet, ensuring a cozy and inviting space for your cat to lounge.
- **Stability:** Engineered with a safe and stable base that resists tipping and wobbling, making it ideal for placement on a flat floor against the wall.
- **Functionality:** Equipped with a hang ball for playful engagement and a sisal scratching post to satisfy your cat's natural scratching instincts, it's the perfect rest and play space for kittens or a medium-sized cat.
- **Assembly:** Hassle-free and easy to assemble within 1 to 8 minutes, with all the necessary tools included.
- **Customer Service:** TSCOMON's commitment to quality products and attentive service means customer satisfaction is always our top priority.
- **Dimensions:** Overall size of 11" x 15" x 41", fitting seamlessly into your living space.
- **Color Options:** Available in three elegant colors - Grey, Beige, and Green - to match your home decor.
- **Weight:** Lightweight at just 6 Pounds for easy maneuverability.
- **Package Contents:** Each box includes 1 Cat Tree, Assembly Instructions, and a Set of Tools.

**Important Notes:**
- Please check the size before purchasing to ensure a good fit for your space.
- For enhanced stability, place the cat tree on a flat floor against a wall.
- Prioritize child safety by not allowing children to play with the cat tree.

Transform your home into a feline paradise with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree and watch your cat enjoy endless hours of fun and relaxation!

### TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree

**Product Overview:**
Indulge your feline friend with the luxurious TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree, the perfect blend of comfort, play, and style for your beloved pet. This 2-in-1 cat condo and sisal scratching post offers a private rest space and an engaging play area, all while seamlessly integrating into your home decor with its unique leaves design.

**Key Features:**
- **Design:** A 2-in-1 Cat Condo and Scratching Post that adds a touch of greenery to your home.
- **Material:** Crafted with high-quality 600g skin-friendly plush and a soft carpet base, ensuring a cozy experience for your cat.
- **Stability:** Equipped with a safe and stable base to prevent tipping and wobbling, designed for placement on a flat floor against the wall.
- **Functionality:** Features a large condo space suitable for kittens or one medium cat, a hanging play ball, and a sisal material scratching post to satisfy your cat's natural instincts.
- **Assembly:** Easy to assemble within 1 to 8 minutes, with all necessary tools included and simple instructions to follow.
- **Customer Service:** Committed to providing quality products and attentive service, with customer satisfaction as the primary goal.
- **Dimensions:** Overall size of 11" x 15" x 41", making it a perfect fit for various room sizes.
- **Color Options:** Available in three elegant colors - Grey, Beige, and Green - to match your home's aesthetic.
- **Weight:** Lightweight at only 6 Pounds, making it easy to move and adjust.
- **Package Contents:** Includes 1 Cat Tree, 1 Assembly Instruction manual, and 1 Set of Tools.

**Safety Notes:**
- **Size Check:** Please ensure to check the dimensions before purchasing to accommodate your cat's size.
- **Placement Recommendation:** For added stability, place the cat tree on a flat floor against a wall.
- **Child Safety:** To prevent accidents, do not allow children to play with the cat tree.

Transform your home into a feline paradise with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree, where your cat can lounge, scratch, and play to their heart's content. Order now and give your pet the luxurious life they deserve!
